title: Seeded apple and berry overnight oats

ingredients.item: 250g pouch cooked Merchant Gourmet Super Seeds with Quinoa & Chia
300g mixed berries, such as raspberries and blueberries
2 tbsp almonds, toasted and roughly chopped

instructions.step: Mix the oats, seeds, apples, berries, vanilla paste, maple syrup and oat drink in a large bowl. Cover and chill for at least 5 hours or overnight.
Stir well, then divide between bowls and top with the Simply Plain and almonds.
